ca.proj.game.level.tiles
Class Tile

java.lang.Object
  ca.proj.game.level.tiles.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicTile
public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object

Tile.java is the class that represents the tiles in each level.
